description:
A set of advanced medicine that will come in handy in a pinch.

Tear All Balm x10
EP Charge IV x10
Curia Balm x10
Celestial Balm EX x10

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
name: Trails of Cold Steel III: Advanced Medicine Set 3
